Title: iOS 26.2 Adds APIs for Texas App Store Parental Consent Law
Description:
Apple today detailed the tools it is providing developers for compliance with the App Store Accountability Act (SB 2420) that goes into effect in Texas in 2026.
Starting on January 1, 2026, Apple users in Texas will need to confirm whether they are 18 ye…

Title: Yes, Trump's tariffs are raising billions -- but at a steep economic cost
Description:
Trump's tariffs are raising tens of billions of dollars for the federal government.
They're also costing consumers, frustrating businesses and hurting the factories they're supposed to help.

Title: I left Google after 10 years to launch my AI startup in Tokyo. I can accomplish a lot more in Japan than in Silicon Valley.
Description:
Jad Tarifi, 42, worked at Google for nearly a decade.
He relocated to Japan in 2020 and founded his own AI startup, Integral AI a year later.

Description: Just how automated the B-21 is remains unclear, but officials pushing to fly it with just one pilot points to a breakthrough operational capability.

Title: CT Election Day live updates: Democrats flip multiple seats in Connecticut
Description: More than 192,271 votes were cast in early voting around Connecticut and hundreds of thousands more were expected Tuesday.

Title: Preds irked as Wild net winner with net displaced
Description: The Minnesota Wild scored a controversial overtime goal with the net displaced Tuesday night, and the Nashville Predators, who fell 3-2, addressed it after the loss, with coach Andrew Brunette saying the team disagrees with the opinion of the officials.
